==============
git diff tools
==============

**XML**

- xmldiff
- XMLdiff-xmlrev
- libxml-semanticdiff-perl

**LaTeX**

- latexdiff
  
  - http://tex.stackexchange.com/questions/1325/using-latexdiff-with-git
  - http://feng.li/latexdiff-with-git/

**Text**

- difftools
- wdiff, dwdiff: word-by-word comparison

**PDF**

- http://tante.cc/blog/2009/03/24/versioning-pdf-files-with-git/

  Uses pdftotext

- diffpdf

**Images**

- perceptualdiff
- exiftool and text-diff

**MSWORD**

- catdoc: up to word 97
- antiword: up to word 2000
- unoconv
- python-docx


**Binary**

- bsdiff
- bsdiff4: Python lib to binary diff and patch using the BSDIFF4-format

**General**

- Python difflib

**HOWTOs**

- http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19631432/how-can-i-add-a-different-git-diff-tool-for-pdf
